name: One (itch) (sunamika)
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2019.

My/Our first ever jam. Definitely not the best, but I learned a lot and had tons of fun.

Scrapped a lot of ideas and prototype and ended up with this 'One'.

Play with a friend and have fun.

Controls:

Player 1:

WASD - to Move

J - to shoot

Player 2:

Arrow Keys - to Move

Num4 - to shoot

Pick up the energy sphere at the middle and shoot it towards the enemy. Energy sphere is fatal after release. Plan and use the surfaces to hit your enemy.

art by: https://twitter.com/Ren_Ai
